alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:59PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jones and northeastern Fisher Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roby, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. Heavy rainfall up to 3/4 inch is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamlin, Roby, Sylvester, Neinda, Mccaulley, Hitson and Tuxedo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
